actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A resolution to express the sense of the Senate concerning the payment of social security obligations.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Declares the sense of the Senate that, as the Secretary of the Treasury plans for cash flow management in the absence of an extension to the debt limit of the United States, the Secretary shall give first priority to the payment of Social Security benefits over the payment of other Government obligations.

titles.title: A resolution to express the sense of the Senate concerning the payment of social security obligations.
